name: Do the Dishes Tomorrow
description:
Someday you'll do the dishes but today is not that day. Click on the counter to place a dirty dish that you'll clean some other time. See how long you can go before you run out of counter space.

This is my submission for LD50. 

LD Jam Link https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/do-the-dishes-tomorrow
